== I'm trying to sign up but I didn't get a confirmation code. Help? ==

If you didn't get your registration email, you can tell the system to try again.  Simply follow the procedure for <nowiki>[[SSO-FAQs-Reset_Password|resetting your password]]</nowiki>, as many times as you like.  Also, be sure to check your spam folder, if you have one.
